english_text: In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful
persian_text: به نام خدا، بخشنده ترين، مهربان ترين.

english_text: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of the people.
persian_text: بگو: "پناه می برم به پروردگار مردم.
"از شر آنان که پنهانی وسوسه می کنند.

english_text: "Who whisper into the chests of the people.
persian_text: "آنان كه در سينه های مردم وسوسه می كنند.

english_text: "Be they of the jinns, or the people."
persian_text: "خواه از جنيان باشند، خواه از مردم."
footnote: *114:6 Thus, the total occurrence of the crucial word "God" (Allah) throughout the Quran is 2698, 19x142. The reader can ascertain the accuracy of this total by randomly checking the numbers of the word "God" at the bottom of any pages in this book. Additionally, if one adds the verse numbers wherever the word "God" occurs, the total comes to 118123, also a multiple of 19 (118123 = 19x6217). Details of the Quran's unique mathematical composition are given in Appendices 1, 2, 24, 25, 26, and 29.
